column2: A ring once blessed by Ninis, a spirit of ice.
A ring once blessed by Filla, a spirit of fire.
A ring once blessed by Thor, a spirit of lightning.
A ring once blessed by Set, a spirit of wind.
An amulet of the god Delphi. Protects fliers from arrows.
A device that negates enemy critical attacks.
Swiftsole boots that increase movement speed.
A scroll with techniques on becoming more proficient with many different weapons.
A treasure said to improve defense.
A treasure said to improve luck.
A treasure said to improve skill.
A treasure said to improve resistance.
A card that provides discounts at many shops.
A card that grants the bearer purchasing privileges at special shops.
[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has brought back a fine item!
Finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for.
I will pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] fairly for [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] effort.
